data.desc: Buccaneers or privateers raid at least two Maya hamlets
data.prim_n: MEXICO,158 [Probanza o méritos y servicios Capitán Francisco Pérez a 11 nov 1661]
data.note:
Uatibal, Chanlacan location /v Jones xv-xvii, 283-5
 Possibly see 28 May 1652 Minzapa [Gulf of Mex]. c 30 Fr Eng pirates raid /v Marley P 1 438
